name: Level Info Colors
description: A mod that allows you to customize the background color of the level info page.

normal-color.name: Normal Color
normal-color.description: The color of the background when the level is not daily, weekly, or in a gauntlet.

daily-color.name: Daily Color
daily-color.description: The color of the background when the level is daily.

weekly-color.name: Weekly Color
weekly-color.description: The color of the background when the level is weekly.

gauntlet-color.name: Gauntlet Color
gauntlet-color.description: The color of the background when the level is in a gauntlet.
